rows.label: qev065503_MSG0001
rows.name:
Are you a BLADE? My name is Lucy,
and I work in Skell development.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065503_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'm on break at the moment, though.
...Er, did you need assistance with something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065503_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Lucy how she would describe herself.

rows.label: qev065503_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Lucy that you know someone
who wants to meet her.

rows.label: qev065503_MSG0003
rows.name:
My personality, you mean? Well, I'm not especially
interested in anything but my research. I suppose you'd
say that I lead a fairly dry life...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065503_MSG0004
rows.name:
On my days off, I'll stay in and do crosswords all day.
I love the feel of watching my knowledge fill up those
blanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065503_MSG0005
rows.name:
...Men? Oh, I'm no good with men. Though if there
was one who could accept my quirks, it might be
nice to have some crossword company.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065503_MSG0006
rows.name:
I'm sorry, humor isn't really my forte. I'm sure it's a
very funny joke, but you'll need to explain it to...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065503_MSG0008
rows.name:
I can't imagine it's any fun talking to me, but...
Well, if he's interested in meeting me,
I suppose the least I can do is talk to him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065503_MSG0009
rows.name:
You're certain this wasn't a joke? I just can't believe
that someone like him could possibly be interested in
me. It makes no sense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065503_MSG0010
rows.name:
I'm a terrible bore. A woman with no interests outside
of her work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065503_MSG0011
rows.name:
But he listens to me talk as if it's the most interesting
thing in the world. He's...very kind.[ST:wait ]
